name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic manual ad blocker for YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically perform a manual ad block action on YouTube ad centre

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically block ads on Youtube™ and Youtube Music by performing action on youtube Ad Centre.

About:
This extension block ad via scripting through the original element on Youtube™.
It perform specific action on youtube elements to block ad.
all action performed by this extension can be done manually via youtube Ad centre.

Permissions: 
permission of activeTab and scripting is needed.

Features:
block ad via the ad block centre through script
potential decrease unwanted ads on youtube by reporting ads automatically

*Any video ad detection happens on your computer and nothing will be collected.

developer's Notes:
huge latency of network or Internet corruption may lead to a delay or action not performing.

Changelogs:
[1.0.1] fixed problem on not running that caused by language setting
[1.0.2] fixed repeat due to network coruption, remake 16x icon
[1.0.3] fixed not running issue on Youtube music
